description: A React component module that defines accessible tab toggle components for switching between different views (Preview, Code, HTML, JS) with proper ARIA attributes and focus styling.

methods.name: TabToggle({ value, onChange, idBase = 'preview-code' })
methods.description: A React functional component providing an accessible toggle between 'Preview' and 'Code' tabs, with focus-visible rings and ARIA attributes.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' })
methods.description: A React functional component providing accessible sub-tabs for 'HTML' and 'JS' code views inside a code panel, with proper ARIA attributes and focus styling.

ctags.name: CodeTabs
ctags.pattern: /^export function CodeTabs({ html, js, renderBlock, idBase = 'code-tabs' }) {$/
